name: maginium/module-framework
description: Maginium Framework module for Magento 2. Provides utilities and integrations for extended functionality.

suggest.ext-fileinfo: Required to use the Filesystem class.
suggest.ext-memcached: Required to use the memcache cache driver.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker and console signal trapping.
suggest.ext-pdo: Required to use all database features.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-redis: Required to use the Redis cache and queue drivers (^4.0|^5.0|^6.0).
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver, DynamoDb failed job storage, and SES mail driver (^3.322.9).
suggest.brianium/paratest: Required to run tests in parallel (^7.0|^8.0).
suggest.fakerphp/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (^1.9.1).
suggest.filp/whoops: Required for friendly error pages in development (^2.14.3).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.league/flysystem-path-prefixing: Required to use the scoped driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (^5.0).
suggest.php-http/discovery: Required to use PSR-7 bridging features (^1.15).
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Required to use assertions and run tests (^10.5|^11.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the predis connector (^2.3).
suggest.psr/http-message: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0).
suggest.pusher/pusher-php-server: Required to use the Pusher broadcast driver (^6.0|^7.0).
suggest.resend/resend-php: Required to enable support for the Resend mail transport (^0.10.0).
suggest.symfony/filesystem: Required to enable support for relative symbolic links (^7.0).
